com.gsma.mobileconnect.helpers

Class MobileConnectInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsma.mobileconnect.helpers.MobileConnectInterface

  • public class MobileConnectInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to wrap the calls to the Mobile Connect SDK.

    This class assumes access to HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse it should be usable in most java web frameworks.

    It expects resources similar to the files in resources/public and resources/META-INF

    • Method Detail

      • callMobileConnectForStartDiscovery

        public static MobileConnectStatus callMobileConnectForStartDiscovery(IDiscovery discovery,
                                                     MobileConnectConfig config,
                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest,
                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse servletResponse)
        This method is called to initiate the Mobile Connect process.

        Optionally proxy cookies between the client and the discovery service. Data not to be sent back to the client is stored in the session.

        The discovery response for an identified operator is stored in the session.

        The return is either an 'error', 'operator selection is required' or 'authorization can start' (the operator has been identified).

        Parameters:
        discovery - A discovery SDK instance
        config - Mobile Connect Configuration instance
        servletRequest - The servlet request.
        servletResponse - The servlet response.
        Returns:
        A status object

      • callMobileConnectOnDiscoveryRedirect

        public static MobileConnectStatus callMobileConnectOnDiscoveryRedirect(IDiscovery discovery,
                                                       MobileConnectConfig config,
                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest,
                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse servletResponse)
        This method is called to extract the response from the operator selection process and then determine what to do next.

        Optionally proxy cookies between the client and the discovery service. Data not to be sent back to the client is stored in the session.

        The discovery response for an identified operator is stored in the session.

        The return is either an 'error', 'start the discovery process again' or 'authorization can start' (the operator has been identified).

        Parameters:
        discovery - A discovery SDK instance
        config - Mobile Connect Configuration instance
        servletRequest - The servlet request.
        servletResponse - The servlet response
        Returns:
        A status object

      • callMobileConnectForStartAuthorization

        public static MobileConnectStatus callMobileConnectForStartAuthorization(IOIDC oidc,
                                                         MobileConnectConfig config,
                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest)
        This method is called to start the operator authorization process after the operator has been identified.

        The discovery response for an identified operator is expected to be found in the session.

        Parameters:
        oidc - An instance of the OIDC SDK
        config - The configuration to be used.
        servletRequest - The request, used to access then session
        Returns:
        A status object encoding an error, start operator discovery or url to redirect to.

      • callMobileConnectOnAuthorizationRedirect

        public static MobileConnectStatus callMobileConnectOnAuthorizationRedirect(IOIDC oidc,
                                                           MobileConnectConfig config,
                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest)
        This method is called via the redirect from the operator authorization page.

        The values encoded in the URL are used to obtain an authorization token from the operator.

        Parameters:
        oidc - An instance of the OIDC SDK
        config - The config to be used.
        servletRequest - The servlet request, used to access the session.
        Returns:
        A status object that is either an error, start discovery or complete.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A unique string.

      • getErrorResponse

        static ErrorResponse getErrorResponse(IDiscovery discovery,
                             DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse)
        Extract an error response from a discovery response, create a generic error if the discovery response does not contain an error response.
        Parameters:
        discovery - Implementation of the Discovery SDK.
        discoveryResponse - The discovery response to check.
        Returns:
        The extracted error response, or a generic error.

        Extract an error response from a request token response, create a generic error if the request token response does not contain an error response.
        Parameters:
        requestTokenResponse - The request token response to query
        Returns:
        The extracted error or a generic error

        Check if the response code indicates a successful response.
        Parameters:
        responseCode - The response code to check.
        Returns:
        True if the request was successful.

        static boolean hasDiscoveryResponse(MobileConnectState mobileConnectState)
        Test whether the mobileConnectState has a discovery response.
        Parameters:
        mobileConnectState - The mobile connect state to check.
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • hasMatchingState

        static boolean hasMatchingState(java.lang.String responseState,
                       java.lang.String requestState)
        Test whether the state values in the Authorization request and the Authorization response match.

        States match if both are null or the values equal each other.

        Parameters:
        responseState - The state contained in the response.
        requestState - The state contained in the request.
        Returns:
        True if the states match, false otherwise.

      • getMobileConnectState

        static MobileConnectState getMobileConnectState(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Utility method to get the MobileConnectState from the session.
        Parameters:
        request - The request, used to access the session.
        Returns:
        The MobileConnectSession.

      • getCurrentCookies

        static java.util.List<KeyValuePair> getCurrentCookies(boolean isCookiesEnabled,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest)
        Optionally extract the list of cookies in the request.
        Parameters:
        isCookiesEnabled - Only extract the cookies if true.
        servletRequest - The request to extract the cookies from.
        Returns:
        The list of cookies in the request, or an empty list.

      • proxyCookies

                java.util.List<KeyValuePair> headers,
                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse servletResponse)
        Optionally add cookies to the response.
        Parameters:
        isCookiesEnabled - Only add the cookies if this is true.
        headers - The list of headers containing cookies.
        servletResponse - The response to add the cookies to.
